message: Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to end this quickly.
I think 55/45 is more than fair, considering the inflation hits you harder.

You said 58/42 was your final offer? I think it's more reasonable the other way around, considering the inflation is hurting you more with each round.
